pull.title: [Trivial] Update license year range to 2018
pull.body:
The same as #9617.

Happy new year! :smiley:

events.body: Probably easier to review, since this was presumably done manual and the other one was done by a script?

issue.title: [Trivial] Update license year range to 2019
issue.body:
Bitcoin Core is going to become 10 so the license year range also needs an update.
2019 is coming very soon so it is the time to update the year range like every year.

Same as #12063
